desc: RevStretch is home of the Pro Stretching Belt, the #1 plantar fasciitis pain relief band on the market. It is designed for those with tight muscles in the foot. It secures around your ankle and creates a deep stretch that is sure to help eliminate plantar fascia issues, heel spurs, tight calves or hamstrings, and more.

layout.text: The Holy Grail for Foot Pain...
RevStretch is the #1 solution for Plantar fasciitis, heel spurs, tight muscles, and achilles tendinitis. Join thousands of pain-free, happy customers.
